compatibility.notes: SSPL-1.0 has a strong copyleft nature, meaning that any derivative work must also be licensed under SSPL-1.0. Care should be taken when combining with other licenses.

key_requirements: Provide appropriate legal notices in user interfaces.
Disclose the source code of modified versions when used in a network service.
State any changes made to the original Program.
license.name: SSPL-1.0
obligations: If you modify the Program and use it to provide a service, you must make the source code of your modified version available to the users of that service.
You must include a copy of this license with any distribution of the Program.
You must include a copyright notice in any distribution of the Program.
